text:
EL PASSION - Warsaw, Poland - Full Time - VISA - Senior Ruby on Rails developer, Senior iOS developer, UI/UX designer

EL Passion is a Polish development and design house, working on interesting startup apps for clients in Western Europe and the US.

We're a growing company looking for:

- Senior Ruby on Rails developer

- Senior iOS developer

- UI/UX designer

All you fellow HN's can read more and apply to our job ads here: http://www.elpassion.com/careers/
